Thanks for joining our live coverage on an extraordinary day in court, with adult-film star Stormy Daniels taking the stand.

It was a tense courtroom, with Daniels warned to dial back her comments at times. Prosecutors were also told to limit their questions regarding the salacious details of her alleged sexual encounter with Trump (which Trump has denied ever took place).

Here's our full wrap of what happened in court today.

This page was edited by Tiffany Wertheimer, Lisa Lambert, Brandon Livesay and Phil McCausland. The writers were Sam Hancock and Sean Seddon, and we had Madeline Halpert and Kayla Epstein in court.

Court doesn't sit on Wednesday, so we'll be back on Thursday, when Stormy Daniels will once again take to the stand to continue her testimony.

Once upon a time, there was a young boy named John who stumbled upon a mysterious treasure in the forest. It was a golden chest filled with all kinds of magical items, including a magic lamp. John couldn't resist the temptation to rub the lamp and release the genie within. The genie granted him three wishes, and John's first wish was for a grand mansion.
As he stepped inside his new home, John was overcome with joy and excitement. He couldn't believe that his dream of living in a luxurious house had come true. He spent hours exploring every corner of the house and admiring the beautiful furnishings. However, he soon realized that he didn't have anyone to share his joy with.
That's when John made his second wish. He asked the genie for a loving wife who would make him happy and complete his life. The genie granted his wish and John was overjoyed to meet his beautiful and kind wife. They spent many happy years together, but as time passed, they began to grow apart. John realized that he had taken his wife for granted and hadn't appreciated her enough.
With his third wish, John wished for his wife to be by his side forever. The genie granted his wish, and John was thrilled to have his wife back in his life. They spent the rest of their days together, cherishing each moment they had with each other.
But John also learned an important lesson. He realized that true love isn't just about having a beautiful house or a loving partner. It's about appreciating what you have and giving back to those who have given you so much. John decided to use his wealth and influence to help others in need, and he became a philanthropist.
As he grew older, John continued to help those in need and to spread joy wherever he went. He realized that the true meaning of life wasn't in material possessions or personal accomplishments, but in making a positive impact on the world. He became a role model for many, and his legacy continues to inspire people to this day.
In the end, John learned that true love isn't just about finding the perfect partner or having the perfect life. It's about finding happiness in the small things and making a difference in the world. And that, my friends, is the true story of John and his journey to finding true love.

As she stepped inside her new home, Emma was overcome with joy and excitement. She couldn't believe that her dream of living in a luxurious house had come true. She spent hours exploring every corner of the house and admiring the beautiful furnishings. However, she soon realized that she didn't have anyone to share her joy with.
That's when Emma made her second wish. She asked the genie for a loving husband who would make her happy and complete her life. The genie granted her wish and Emma was overjoyed to meet her handsome and kind husband. They spent many happy years together, but as time passed, they began to grow apart. Emma realized that she had taken her husband for granted and hadn't appreciated him enough.
With her third wish, Emma wished for her husband to be by her side forever. The genie granted her wish, and Emma was thrilled to have her husband back in her life. They spent the rest of their days together, cherishing each moment they had with each other.
But Emma also learned an important lesson. She realized that true love isn't just about having a beautiful house or a loving partner. It's about appreciating what you have and giving back to those who have given you so much. Emma decided to use her wealth and influence to help others in need, and she became a philanthropist.
As she grew older, Emma continued to help those in need and to spread joy wherever she went. She realized that the true meaning of life wasn't in material possessions or personal accomplishments, but in making a positive impact on the world. She became a role model for many, and her legacy continues to inspire people to this day.
In the end, Emma learned that true love isn't just about finding the perfect partner or having the perfect life. It's about finding happiness in the small things and making a difference in the world. And that, my friends, is the true story of Emma and her journey to finding true love.
